channel.title: 562 Super nooby question
channel.description:
Okay, now I have completely blanked out, and I forgot what to do to get it online.
Do i have to change the ip on the source side somewhere? If I do where. And on the client where do I change the ip's, I already changed it in client.java but is that it? My client came already set on local host, so I'm not sure what to change exactly :S
EDIT: okay so my server works fine on local host, but when I attempt to put my ip, it says "connecting to update server" and doesnt change -.- any ideas?

item.title: 562 Super nooby question
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Okay, now I have completely blanked out, and I forgot what to do to get it online.

Do i have to change the ip on the source side somewhere? If I do where.
